data.title: 45 Celebrities Who Vape From Every Field– You Never Know
data.meta_description: Vaping is taking the world by storm as a healthier alternative to smoking. But don't take our word for it…check out these celebs sho have all taken up vaping.
data.text:
Throughout the world, vaping has become increasingly popular. But did you know that there are many celebrities who vape?

Below, you can find a collection of movie stars, musicians, television stars, models, and other celebrities who aren’t afraid to show off their love for vaping.

10 Mainstream Movie Stars Who Vape

Leonardo DiCaprio

Credit: Getty Images

Age: 44

Birthplace: Los Angeles, California

Representative Work: Titanic, Gangs of New York, Catch Me If You Can, Inception, Django Unchained, The Wolf of Wall Street, The Revenant.

As you likely know, Leonardo DiCaprio is one of the most famous actors in the world. He has been seen vaping in many locations, including the 2016 Screen Actors Guild award show.

Johnny Depp

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 55

Birthplace: Owensboro, Kentucky

Representative Work: Platoon, Edward Scissorhands, Pirates of the Caribbean, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, The Tourist, Alice in Wonderland, Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald.

Johnny Depp is one of the first mainstream actors to vape—both on and off of the big screen. In his role in the 2010 film The Tourist, Depp vapes on a train with an e-cigarette.

Samuel L. Jackson

Credit: Reddit

Age: 70

Birthplace: Washington, DC

Representative Work: Goodfellas, Jurassic Park, Pulp Fiction, Jackie Brown, Django Unchained, The Hateful Eight.

Samuel L. Jackson has made his love for vaping known, as he often posts pictures of his vaping habit on his Twitter page.

Isla Fisher

Credit: Vaping360

Age: 43

Birthplace: Muscat, Oman

Representative Work: Wedding Crashers, Confessions of a Shopaholic, The Great Gatsby, Now You See Me.

Isla Fisher has been seen vaping in public on several occasions. She also took some puffs from an e-cigarette in the film Now You See Me.

Jack Nicholson

Credit: Getty Images

Age: 81

Birthplace: Neptune City, New Jersey

Representative Work: Easy Rider, One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest, The Shining, As Good As It Gets, Batman, A Few Good Men, The Departed.

Jack Nicholson has been seen vaping in public on several occasions, including at sporting events and at signings.

Katherine Heigl

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 40

Birthplace: Oakley, Utah

Representative Work: Knocked Up, 27 Dresses, Grey’s Anatomy, New Year’s Eve, The Big Wedding, Unforgettable.

Katherine Heigel isn’t afraid to show off her love for vaping, including taking a puff on an appearance on The Tonight Show with David Letterman.

Ben Affleck

Credit: Vape Wind Ejuice/Pinterest

Age: 46

Birthplace: Berkeley, California

Representative Work: Good Will Hunting, Pearl Harbor, The Sum of All Fears, The Town, Gone Girl, Batman v. Superman: Dawn of Justice.

Ben Affleck has been seen vaping several times in public. Often, he is vaping in the car or when he was walking to or from meetings.

Tom Hardy

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 41

Birthplace: London, England

Representative Work: Black Hawk Down, The Revenant, The Dark Knight Rises, Inception, Mad Max: Fury Road, Dunkirk, Venom.

Tom Hardy isn’t afraid to vape during interviews, as you can see in the image above.

Michelle Rodriguez

Credit: Splash

Age: 40

Birthplace: San Antonio, Texas

Representative Work: The Fast and the Furious, Resident Evil, S.W.A.T., Avatar, Lost.

Michelle Rodriguez has been seen vaping with a wide range of vape mods.

Catherine Zeta-Jones

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 49

Birthplace: Swansea, Wales

Representative Work: The Mask of Zorro, Entrapment, Chicago, Intolerable Cruelty, Ocean’s Twelve, The Terminal, No Reservations, Red 2.

Catherine Zeta-Jones apparently turned to vaping after her husband, Michael Douglas, was diagnosed with throat cancer.

10 Mainstream Television Stars Who Vape

Simon Cowell

Credit: Vape Wind Ejuice/Pinterest

Age: 59

Birthplace: London, England

Representative Work: American Idol, Pop Idol, The X Factor, Britain’s Got Talent, America’s Got Talent

According to press reports, Simon Cowell decided to take up vaping to protect the health of his son Eric.

Lindsay Lohan

Credit: SimpleVape.ca/Pinterest

Age: 32

Birthplace: New York, New York

Representative Work: Lindsay Lohan’s Beach Club, Mean Girls, Freaky Friday, The Parent Trap.

Both a television and movie star, Lindsay Lohan has never been afraid to show her love for e-cigarettes when on the job or walking around her hometown.

Natasha Lyonne

Credit: Qsssv.net

Age: 39

Birthplace: New York, New York

Representative Work: Orange is the New Black, Russian Doll, Steven Universe, Portlandia.

Natasha Lyonne dropped smoking and picked up vaping after open heart surgery.

Julia Louis-Dreyfus

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 58

Birthplace: New York, New York

Representative Work: Seinfeld, Saturday Night Live, The New Adventures of Old Christine, Veep.

Julia Louis-Dreyfus showed off her love for vaping at the Golden Globe Awards.

Richard Hammond

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 49

Birthplace: Solihull, England

Representative Work: Top Gear, Brainiac: Science Abuse, Total Wipeout, Planet Earth Live

When he isn’t presenting on television, Richard Hammond occasionally likes to partake in vaping.

Norman Reedus

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 50

Birthplace: Hollywood, Florida

Representative Work: The Walking Dead, The Boondock Saints, Ride with Norman Reedus

Norman Reedus took up vaping to eliminate his tobacco habit. He has been spotted stocking up on e-liquid in several vape shops.

Stephen Dorff

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 45

Birthplace: Atlanta, Georgia

Representative Work: True Detective, The Power of One, Backbeat, Somewhere, Blade.

After he suffered from emphysema after smoking tobacco, Stephen Dorff became the frontman for a series of commercials for one e-cigarette brand.

Mischa Barton

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 33

Birthplace: London, England

Representative Work: The O.C., The Beautiful Life: TBL, The Sixth Sense, Notting Hill, The Hills: New Beginnings.

Mischa Barton isn’t afraid to vape and has advocated for others to vape in the U.K. She was the frontwoman for a nationwide campaign to find Britain’s most stylish vaper for Vapestick, an e-cigarette company.

Laura Prepon

Credit: LuxuryLaunches

Age: 39

Birthplace: Watchung, New Jersey

Representative Work: Orange is the New Black, That ‘70s Show, House, The Girl on the Train, The Hero.

While Laura Prepon hasn’t publicly shared her love for vaping, she has been seeing holding e-cigarettes in at least one picture.

Kevin Connolly

Credit: Ecigator Vape Ecig Vapor/Pinterest

Age: 45

Birthplace: Patchogue, New York

Representative Work: Entourage, Unhappily Ever After, Friends with Better Lives.

On several occasions, Kevin Connolly has been seen in public enjoying his vape.

10 Mainstream Famous Singers Who Vape

Katy Perry

Credit: Vape Wind Ejuice/Pinterest

Age: 34

Birthplace: Santa Barbara, California

Representative Work: I Kissed a Girl, Hot n Cold, Teenage Dream, Firework, Part of Me, Wide Awake.

Katy Perry isn’t afraid to show her love for vaping. She was once photographed vaping on an Ego Twist vape pen at her Labor Day party.

Willie Nelson

Credit: PennyVaper/Pinterest

Age: 85

Birthplace: Abbott, Texas

Representative Work: On the Road Again, To All the Girls I’ve Loved Before, Pancho and Lefty.

Willie Nelson switched to vaping several years ago. He was once seen holding the Vapir NO2 Vaporizer.

Bruno Mars

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 33

Birthplace: Honolulu, Hawaii

Representative Work: Just the Way You Are, Grenade, Locked Out of Heaven, That’s What I Like, Uptown Funk.

Bruno Mars began vaping after making the promise to his mother (who later died of a brain aneurysm). He has enthusiastically adopted vaping, going so far as to invest some of his money into one e-cigarette manufacturer.

Christina Milian

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 37

Birthplace: Jersey City, New Jersey

Representative Work: AM to PM, When You Look at Me, Dip It Low, Whatever U Want.

The Dip It Low singer isn’t afraid to show off her passion for vaping, going so far as to promote her vaping lifestyle on her Instagram page.

Zayn Malik

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 26

Birthplace: Bradford, England

Representative Work: Pillowtalk, Still Got Time, Dusk Till Dawn.

Go

Ronnie Wood

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 71

Birthplace: Hillingdon, England

Representative Work: Emotional Rescue, It’s Only Rock ‘n Roll (But I Like It), Dance.

The Rolling Stones guitarist has been seen enjoying his vape pen on several occasions.

Lady Gaga

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 33

Birthplace: New York, New York

Representative Work: Just Dance, Poker Face, Bad Romance, Telephone, Alejandro, Born This Way.

While Lady Gaga used to be a regular smoker, she switched to vaping. Since then, she hasn’t turned back.

Miley Cyrus

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 26

Birthplace: Franklin, Tennessee

Representative Work: Party in the U.S.A., 7 Things, See You Again, We Can’t Stop, Wrecking Ball.

The We Can’t Stop singer has been seen publicly vaping on several occasions, including during some of her performances.

Snoop Dogg

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 47

Birthplace: Long Beach, California

Representative Work: What’s My Name?, Gin & Juice, Drop It Like It’s Hot, Signs.

Snoop Dogg isn’t solely known for his love of gin and juice. He has been seen holding an e-cigarette on several occasions (and even selling his own branded vaporizer).

Britney Spears

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 37

Birthplace: McComb, Mississippi

Representative Work: … Baby One More Time, Oops! … I Did It Again, Toxic, Womanizer.

Britney Spears, according to reports, switched from smoking to vaping in order to become healthier for her children.

5 Famous Models Who Vape

Cara Delevingne

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 26

Birthplace: London, England.

Cara Delevingne was once seen vaping with her friend Michelle Rodriguez at a New York Knicks game in Madison Square Garden.

Helen Flanagan

Credit: McPix Ltd./REX

Age: 28

Birthplace: Bury, England

One of England’s most famous models and actresses switched to vaping because she considers it “a healthier alternative for me.”

Kylie Jenner

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 21

Birthplace: Los Angeles, California

Arguably the most famous member of the Kardashian family has shown her love for vaping through some now deleted videos on her Snapchat feed.

Emily Ratajkowski

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 27

Birthplace: London, England

Emily Ratajkowski has been known to show her love for vaping on her closely-followed Instagram page.

Kate Moss

Credit: LuxuryLaunches

Age: 45

Birthplace: Croydon, England

Kate Moss began vaping in 2013. She is so passionate about it that she once paid an assistant £2000 to fly from London to Spain to find her favorite e-cigarettes.

10 Celebrities in Other Fields Who Vape

Courtney Love

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 54

Birthplace: San Francisco, California

Representative Work: Songwriter, actress, and visual artist.

Courtney Love has been a long-standing member of the vaping scene. Like other celebrities on this list, she appeared as a spokesperson in an e-cigarette company (in her case, NJOY).

Paris Hilton

Credit: Mrlongdrag.com

Age: 38

Birthplace: New York, New York.

Representative Work: Socialite, businesswoman, singer, and model.

Paris Hilton, ever the partier, has been spotted vaping in several nightclubs.

Nate Diaz

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 33

Birthplace: Stockton, California

Representative Work: Mixed martial artist and UFC star.

The former UFC champion enjoys vaping. He even vaped at a press conference after one of his UFC bouts.

Marc Jacobs

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 55

Birthplace: New York, New York

Representative Work: Renowned fashion designer.

The legendary fashion designer, known as a “vaporista” on social media, told the media that his favorite vape flavor is Churros.

Sarah Silverman

Credit: Qssv.net

Age: 48

Birthplace: Bedford, New Hampshire.

Representative Work: Stand-up comedienne, actress, producer, and writer.

The ultra-famous comedienne enjoys vaping, as she shows here while on the red carpet at the 2014 Emmy Awards.

PewDiePie

Credit: Reddit

Age: 29

Birthplace: Gothenburg, Sweden.

Representative Work: YouTuber, comedian, and gamer-commentator.

PewDiePie, one of the internet’s most famous personalities, was once seen with a Coolfire IV box mod on one of his ever-popular videos.

Gloria, Princess of Thurn and Taxis

Credit: Buzzfeed

Age: 59

Birthplace: Stuttgart, Germany

Representative Work: Socialite, businesswoman, philanthropist, activist, and artist.

The German socialist isn’t afraid to let the world know about her love of vaping.

Caitlin Moran

Credit: Buzzfeed

Age: 43

Birthplace: Brighton, England

Representative Work: Journalist, author, and broadcaster.

Caitlin Moran, the famous British journalist, has vaped several times in public—including on stage.

Bobby Brown

Credit: Buzzfeed

Age: 50

Birthplace: Boston, Massachusetts

Representative Work: Singer-songwriter, dancer, and actor.

Bobby Brown, the singer-songwriter and former spouse of Whitney Houston, isn’t afraid to vape in public

Alexa Chung

Credit: Eciggarettedirect.co.uk

Age: 35

Birthplace: Privett, England

Representative Work: Writer, television presenter, model, and fashion designer.

Alexa Chung gave up smoking and switched to vaping. Looking at the picture above, she is happy with her decision.

A Growing Tide of Celebrity Vapers

The celebrities in this list have picked up vaping for a variety of reasons. Regardless of those reasons, these celebrities have found vaping to be an attractive choice. In all likelihood, we will see more celebrities take their lead and embrace vaping.
